articles.description: Latest football news and gossip plus reaction to Manchester City's top-of-the-table clash with Arsenal
articles.title: Football latest and reaction to Manchester City v Arsenal

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer explains why he is expecting plenty more twists in the Premier League title race with nine games to go.
articles.title: 'Advantage Liverpool - but they are not my title favourites'

articles.description: Amy Jones hits a superb unbeaten 92 to lead England to a four-wicket win over New Zealand in the first ODI in Wellington.
articles.title: Jones leads England past New Zealand in first ODI

articles.description: Former Detroit Lions player Cameron Sutton hands himself in to police to face domestic violence allegations, more than three weeks after an arrest warrant was issued.
articles.title: Cameron Sutton: Former Detroit Lions defensive back hands himself in to police

articles.description: Almost a year since their collapse, Arsenal prove at Manchester City they are not going away in the Premier League title race.
articles.title: 'Stern and steely Arsenal not going away in title race'

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp is full of admiration for Brighton counterpart Roberto de Zerbi, who has been linked to succeeding the German at Anfield.
articles.title: Klopp hails 'incredible' De Zerbi after Anfield love-in

articles.description: LeBron James secures a place alongside fellow great Michael Jordan in the NBA record books as his 40-point haul helps the Los Angeles Lakers beat the Brooklyn Nets 116-104.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James leads Los Angeles Lakers to dominant win against Brooklyn Nets

articles.description: Rishabh Pant scores his first half-century since a 14-month injury absence as Delhi Capitals beat Chennai Super Kings in the Indian Premier League.
articles.title: Pant prowess helps Capitals beat Super Kings

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who is a warrior? - Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Real Madrid's final match before facing Manchester City in the Champions League ends in victory over Athletic Bilbao thanks to two fine goals by Rodrygo.
articles.title: Real Madrid win to go eight points clear at top
